articles.author: Ben Berkowitz
articles.title: Trump threatens higher India tariffs, accuses nation of funding war in Ukraine - Axios
articles.description: Trump is going hard on the offensive against a long-standing ally.
articles.content:
Catch up quick: The U.S. has threatened sanctions against countries that buy Russian oil, primarily China and India. But Trump has saved his sharpest ire on the subject for the latter. 
What they're… [+1513 chars]
